data.title: News
data.text:
Youth 10 (Y10) monthly pass starts on September 1, 2024

Whitby, Ontario – Durham Region Transit (DRT) is once again offering the discounted Y10 monthly youth pass via PRESTO. Customers who are 13 to 19 years of age can purchase the Y10 monthly pass for $84.24 per month.

Customers who purchase a pass every month from September until June will save $19.44 on each consecutive Y10 monthly pass, for a total of $194.40 in savings.

When: Y10 passes are available for purchase starting on August 21, 2024. The September Y10 monthly pass becomes active on September...

Detour - Route 407 - Wilson Road between Dean Avenue and Bloor Street

When: Monday, July 15, 07:00 to Monday, August 19, 19:00

Route: 407

Due to a road closure on Wilson Road between Dean Avenue and Bloor Street, Route 407 Ritson will detour. Northbound buses will operate via Bloor Street, Harmony Road, Olive Avenue and Wilson Road.

The following stops will be closed during construction:

Stop #1063 - Bloor Eastbound @ Wilson Road (east side stop)

Stop #1084 - Bloor Westbound @ Holland Street

Stop #1064 - Bloor Eastbound @ Farewell Street

Stop #1083 - Bloor Westbound @...

Stop Closure - Stop # 2156 - Harwood @ Doric and stop #2153 - Harwood @ Ontario

When: Thursday, July 11, 07:00 to Monday, September 30, 2024, 18:00

Route: 216

Due to construction, stop #2156 – Harwood Avenue northbound @ Doric Street and stop #2153 - Harwood Avenue southbound @ Ontario Street will be temporarily closed.

Please use the stops located on Harwood Avenue, north of Doric Street at Mandrake Street.

Stop #2157 - Harwood Avenue northbound @ Mandrake Street.

Stop #2152 - Harwood Avenue southbound @ Gardiner Drive.

Detour- Walmart in Uxbridge

When: Wednesday, July 3, 7:00 until further notice

Route: 605

Due to construction at the Walmart plaza in Uxbridge, route 605 will not serve stop #2416 at the Uxbridge Walmart and detour via Welwood Drive, Zehrs driveway and Toronto Street S.

The Walmart stop will not be served in Uxbridge.

Stop #2416 – Eastbound @ 6 Welwood

The following temporary stop will be served during the constuction.

Welwood Drive eastbound, east of Walmart entrance.
